verses.name: Joshua 7:10
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Joshua, Get thee up; wherefore liest thou thus upon thy face?

verses.name: Joshua 7:11
verses.text: Israel hath sinned, and they have also transgressed my covenant which I commanded them: for they have even taken of the accursed thing, and have also stolen, and dissembled also, and they have put it even among their own stuff.

verses.name: Joshua 7:12
verses.text: Therefore the children of Israel could not stand before their enemies, but turned their backs before their enemies, because they were accursed: neither will I be with you any more, except ye destroy the accursed from among you.
